#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
    ll t,i,n,m,a[3005];
    cin>>t;bool flag;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        sort(a,a+m);
        flag=false;
        if(a[0]==1||a[m-1]==n)
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else
        {
            for(i=0;i<n-3;i++)
            {
                if(a[i+1]==a[i]+1 && a[i+2]==a[i]+2)
                {flag=true;break;}
            }
            if(flag) cout<<"NO"<<endl;
            else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
